title: Small Doses Refill: Side Effects of a Song: Girl Like Me (by Jazmine Sullivan)
description:
This week, I'm revisiting and reflecting on our Side Effects of a Song episode about Jazmine Sullivan’s Girl Like Me, which explores how the internet got women switchin’ up.
~
Get tickets to The Black Outside Again Tour! amandaseales.com/tourdates
~
For more content, subscribe to our Patreon (patreon.com/amandaseales)!
~
Book your smooth escape with the experts at European Wax Center. Make a reservation today—your first wax is free.
Listen to the new season of The Happiness Lab with Dr. Laurie Santos, to find out what we get wrong about a range of everyday experiences, and how we can make small behavioral changes to live more enjoyable lives.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
